data: “Straight along, down the steps, bear to the left and you’ll find the Admiralty on the opposite side of the way.”
"Straight along, down the steps, bear to the left and you'll find the Admiralty on the opposite side of the way."
John Dene of Toronto: A Comedy of Whitehall
